title: One Must Guide The Next Generation Well

text_block_list.text:
Finally, it was time for the mock race.
Fenomeno and Gold Ship were going to run.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You kids better keep your eyes peeled, got it~?
And grab a bag, 'cuz my cruise is gonna make you seasick!

Big Sis Golshi! Do your best!
Go get 'em!
text_block_list.name: Elementary School Umamusume

text_block_list.text: Eek... Is she mad...?
text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume Child

text_block_list.text: While Gold Ship was getting the kids excited, Fenomeno's intense fighting spirit had them scared stiff...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Phew... Right!
Golshi-san, stop fooling around! We're about to start!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
This may be a mock race, but it is not a mockery!
We need to focus, so we can set a proper example for the children!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Huh~?? Geez, you're always such a rulesy-schmulesy stick in the mud. You wanna be a straightedge so bad? How about I dump some chalk on your face, huh?!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Ngh!! You should――

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: See ya~♪

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Wha...! You fiend――!

Heheh, Operation Distraction is a success! 
Get swept away by my big wave, baby!
Anchors aweigh～～～～～☆
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text: Fenomeno had completely lost concentration. Unable to recover from her messy start, she got caught up in Gold Ship's pace from start to finish.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Kuh... Rraaaaagh...!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
GOOOOAAAL!
The Golshi-chan Grand Fleet makes their triumphant return!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Whut's da pwoblem, Meno? I didn't even need to make a big wave! You were treading water out there! Wanna try the kiddie pool? Huh??

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Kgh... ――I cannot abide by your behavior!
Your unsportsmanshiplike conduct IS A BAD INFLUENCE ON THE CHILDREN!!

――W... ....Waaahh!!
She's so... she's so scary... W-WAAAAHHHH!!!
text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume Child
Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, kid, keep up the waterworks and you're gonna end growing a big ol' beanstalk. You'll have to eat a plate full of green beans for dinner, y'know? ――So don't cry, okay?
With the help of us adults, we managed to soothe the crying kid. The field trip came to a close, and we sent the kids off without any issue.
Fenomeno chose not to join us in saying goodbye to the kids... But she looked pretty down on herself.

She was an earnest girl, and cared deeply for the children――
Which means she probably blamed herself for what happened.
choice_data_list: ...I'm worried. I should check in on her.
...I'm worried. I should check in on her.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
――I'm so pathetic...
Such an immature fool...!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
――!
Oh... Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Anpan and milk...?
...Heh. It's just like a police procedural.
choice_data_list: ...If you want to talk, I'm here to listen.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ...Thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
My inexperience has been nothing but trouble for you.
...I truly am so immature...
I'm a long way from being able to call myself a "hero".
choice_data_list: That's what you strive to be, right?
That's what you strive to be, right?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
It is.
――My father is on the force, you see.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
He looks fearsome, but his heart brims with justice...
Striving to protect the city so the people in it can live in peace. An honorable, respectable man.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
I inherited his intimidating appearance, and my build has been on the larger side ever since I was a child...
So I've scared off plenty of younger kids in my time.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: I didn't have the kind of experience my father does, and I was always scaring others for no reason... I was less like a superhero... and more like one of the monsters they fight.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ――But when I raced...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
The children told me I was cool.
They said they wanted to race like me one day, with sparkles in their eyes.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
I thought, if I kept racing and showing them my cool side...
Setting an example for them...
Then I could forge a path for them to follow.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: I thought I could give the children hope for a bright and proper future――

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
I thought that... And I tried to strive for it.
But... You can see how it turned out.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ...And I know. I know that the children prefer someone fun and bright, like Golshi-san... She's the kind of grown-up the children want to look up to.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: But... I can't be like her.

I was touched by her conviction. ...And again, her kindness.
Her honesty was dazzling. ...But at the same time concerning.
She was talented. She had a comfortable stride, and her running in the home stretch was powerful―― If she put those talents to good use, she could certainly run in a "cool" way.
But right now, her honest, disciplined attitude was only working against her.
choice_data_list: Just stay calm. Run at your own pace.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ...What?

choice_data_list: You can run in a cool way.
You can run in a cool way.
text_block_list.text:
If she focused, and didn't let herself get thrown off pace――
Then she should be able to close the distance from her rivals with a forceful last push.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Run in... a cool way...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ...Boss.

――Boss! Please, let me call you Boss!
If you were to instruct me... I would be incredibly honored!!
text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
